translation.en: ♪ Everybody, come on in It's time to make a scene ♪
translation.ja: みんな集まれ　　楽しい時間の始まりだ

translation.en: -♪ Let's get in costume, write a song ♪ -Hello! -♪ And everything in between ♪ -[laughs]
translation.ja: 衣装や歌もみんなで作ろう

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause many parts make up the arts ♪ -Whoo-hoo-hoo! Yeah! -♪ Each brings joy to all our hearts ♪ -[chuckles]
translation.ja: アートに触(ふ)れれば　　　　心がワクワク

translation.en: -♪ Circus tricks and improv, too ♪ -Hmm! ♪ Mash 'em up for me and you And dance! ♪
translation.ja: 曲芸や即興(そっきょう)　　みんなで盛り上がろう

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, we can sing ♪ ♪ We can tell a story ♪
translation.ja: さあ 踊(おど)って　歌って　　　　 物語を届けるよ

translation.en: ♪ Put it all together We can do anything ♪
translation.ja: 全部集めれば　　何だってできるんだ 全部集めれば　　何だってできるんだ ジュリーのへや

translation.en: Hey, Jools.
translation.ja: ジュリー先生

translation.en: -Oh, good morning, Gus. -[Toby panting] Isn't it a glorious day?
translation.ja: おはよう ガス今日は いいお天気ね

translation.en: That it is.
translation.ja: 確かに

translation.en: -Hey, Toby. -[barks]
translation.ja: トビー

translation.en: Everything's ready. I mopped, put the house lights on, and glow-taped the stage and steps.
translation.ja: ステージと階段に光るテープを貼(は)りました

translation.en: Oh, bless you. [blows kiss]
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Still in tune. That's a nice surprise.
translation.ja: まだ音程が合ってる

translation.en: I also whipped up some fresh muffins with your dad's recipe.
translation.ja: お父さんのレシピでマフィンも

translation.en: You're an angel.
translation.ja: 天使ね

translation.en: -I know. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: でしょ

translation.en: [sighs] The first day of a new Greenroom Workshop. It's always such fun.
translation.ja: いよいよグリーンルームのワークショップの再開ね

translation.en: Are you as pleased as I am with the lineup of our young performers?
translation.ja: 若い子たちが来るのはうれしいわ ええ

translation.en: -Totally. -The Wizard of Oz... is the perfect show for this group.
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法(まほう)使い」にピッタリね

translation.en: Look at this mop of hair. Does it not scream Scarecrow?
translation.ja: このモップみたいな髪(かみ)！カカシになれるわ

translation.en: -Straight out of central casting. -Oh, I know.
translation.ja: うってつけですね

translation.en: Toby, you are going to love these kids.
translation.ja: あなたも この子たちが好きになるわ

translation.en: -As they are going to love you, of course. -[whimpering] Because they always do. [chuckles]
translation.ja: みんなと仲良くなれるわよ

translation.en: -[door opening] -[sing-song] Hello, Miss Julie!
translation.ja: こんにちは　ジュリー先生！

translation.en: -Oh! -Hi! Remember me?
translation.ja: 覚えてます？　ペリですよ

translation.en: I'm Peri! I'm so excited to be here! Wow! I can't believe it!
translation.ja: 覚えてます？　ペリですよ ここに来られてうれしいわ信じられない！

translation.en: [sing-song] I'm here! I'm actually here!
translation.ja: 来たわ　ついに来たわ

translation.en: -Well, hello, Peri. -Hi.
translation.ja: こんにちは　ペリ ハーイ

translation.en: Hey, I'm Gus. That's Toby. He's very friendly.
translation.ja: 僕はガスその子はトビーだよ

translation.en: Oh, hi, Gus.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: Hi, Toby. Hi.
translation.ja: トビーちゃんね

translation.en: Oh, Miss Julie, I have been begging my mom
translation.ja: ジュリー先生 このワークショップにずっと入りたかったの

translation.en: to let me join the Greenroom Workshop since forever!
translation.ja: このワークショップにずっと入りたかったの

translation.en: -Oh? -[sighs] And it's even dreamier than I imagined.
translation.ja: 想像以上にステキな所ね

translation.en: -Well, we're delighted to have you! -Wow!
translation.ja: 参加してくれてうれしい

translation.en: [gasps] You have a poster from Wicked? I saw it three times.
translation.ja: 「ウィキッド」ね！私は３回見た

translation.en: Am I in the right place?
translation.ja: ここでいいのかしら？

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes! Come in, come in.
translation.ja: ええ　どうぞ入って

translation.en: -[Toby barks] -Oh. Hola, puppy! [laughs]
translation.ja: ワンちゃん！

translation.en: That's Toby. He's very friendly.
translation.ja: トビーよ　人なつっこいの

translation.en: my name is Penelope Guadalupe Fitzgerald Sanchez,
translation.ja: 私はペネロペ･フィッツジェラルド

translation.en: but everyone calls me Fizz.
translation.ja: “フィズ”って呼ばれてる

translation.en: -Welcome to the greenroom, Fizz. -[Fizz giggles]
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: -Ooh! -It's my first day.
translation.ja: 今日が初めてよ

translation.en: I know. It's everyone's first day.
translation.ja: ええ みんなそうなの

translation.en: Oh. [gasps] Wanna see my bandage?
translation.ja: バンドエイド見たい？

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: ケガしたの？

translation.en: Oh, nothing! Um, I just like bandages.
translation.ja: バンドエイドが好きなだけよ

translation.en: Mmm-hmm, I've got one there and one there and one there.
translation.ja: ここと こことここに貼ってるの

translation.en: -Oh, I see. Very impressive. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: そう　面白いわね

translation.en: -Hey, everyone. -Hi.
translation.ja: やあ！

translation.en: Uh, Hank and Spike, right?
translation.ja: ハンクにスパイクね

translation.en: -[Spike] Mmm-hmm. -Hey, guys. Welcome.
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: -[both laughing] -Hey, doggie.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: [Fizz] That's Toby. -Hi. -He's really friendly.
translation.ja: トビーよ　人なつっこいの

translation.en: Hi, I'm Peri. I've been acting, singing and dancing since I was born.
translation.ja: 私はペリ　芝居と歌と踊りが何よりも好きなの

translation.en: Hi, I'm Hank. World's number one baseball fan.
translation.ja: 僕はハンク野球の大ファンなんだ

translation.en: -And I'm Spike. Words are what I like. -Ooh, that rhymes!
translation.ja: 僕はスパイクどこへでも行く 韻(いん)を踏(ふ)んでる！

translation.en: -Yeah. Rhyming's kind of my thing. -[gasps]
translation.ja: 韻を踏むのが好きなんだ

translation.en: Cool! Some keys!
translation.ja: 鍵盤(けんばん)だ！

translation.en: Piano's kind of my thing.
translation.ja: 僕はピアノが好き

translation.en: [Spike] Wow, nice!
translation.ja: うまい！

translation.en: Whoa, we have a virtuoso in our midst.
translation.ja: 巨匠が入ってくれた

translation.en: I'll say. Quite an expert piano player.
translation.ja: 確かにピアノの名人ね

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Virtuoso means expert. I'm gonna put that in my word bank.
translation.ja: “巨匠”って名人のことか書いておこう

translation.en: I collect words in this book. -[all] Oh. -[Gus] Cool.
translation.ja: 言葉を集めてるんです

translation.en: Is this the robotics class?
translation.ja: ロボット工学のクラス？

translation.en: No, this is the Greenroom Performing Arts Workshop.
translation.ja: グリーンルームのワークショップだよ

translation.en: -You must be Riley. -[Riley] Hi.
translation.ja: ライリーね 私は なぜここに？

translation.en: How did I get here?
translation.ja: 私は なぜここに？

translation.en: Well, your mom and dad thought you'd enjoy it. I'm Miss Julie.
translation.ja: お父さんとお母さんが入れてくれたのよ

translation.en: Everybody, this is Riley.
translation.ja: みんな ライリーよ

translation.en: -Hi. Hi. -Hi, Riley, I'm... I'm Gus.
translation.ja: 僕はガスだ

translation.en: Oh, nice tool belt. [chuckles]
translation.ja: いいツールベルトね

translation.en: Thanks. It's got all the stage manager essentials.
translation.ja: 舞台主任には欠かせない

translation.en: Oh, you've got vernier calipers. [stutters] And is that a folding ruler?
translation.ja: ノギスがあるわそれは折り尺？

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yes, it is. -Huh.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Gus is my very able assistant, Riley.
translation.ja: ガスは有能なアシスタントなの

translation.en: He started here as a student, just like all of you are today.
translation.ja: 最初に ここへ来た時は学生だったのよ

translation.en: Yes, I'm a Greenie graduate. At your service.
translation.ja: 卒業生さ　何でも聞いて

translation.en: Now that we're all here, we're going to get name tags
translation.ja: 全員そろったから名札を配るわね

translation.en: and then we're going to take a tour of the theater.
translation.ja: それから劇場の中を案内するわ

translation.en: [Peri] Oh, I can't wait!
translation.ja: うれしい！

translation.en: -[Spike] Nice. -[Riley] Never been in a theater before.
translation.ja: 劇場って初めて

translation.en: [Julie] Thank you. Here we go.
translation.ja: はい 名札よ

translation.en: I like my name tag.
translation.ja: 名札って好きよバンドエイドみたい 〝フィズ〞

translation.en: It reminds me of my bandages.
translation.ja: 名札って好きよバンドエイドみたい 〝フィズ〞 名札って好きよバンドエイドみたい

translation.en: Fizz, darling. [chuckles] Not there.
translation.ja: そこじゃなくて…

translation.en: No, I think it would look better right there.
translation.ja: ここに貼るほうがいいかも

translation.en: -[Fizz] Oh. -Now, before we go out onstage,
translation.ja: 先に言っとくわね

translation.en: you should know that we call this room the greenroom.
translation.ja: この部屋は控室(グリーンルーム)って言うの

translation.en: -[gasps] 'Cause it's green. -[Julie] Ours is, yes,
translation.ja: グリーンだからね グリーンじゃない控室もあるわ

translation.en: but they're... they're not always green.
translation.ja: グリーンじゃない控室もあるわ

translation.en: The greenroom is where we meet, we eat, we rest,
translation.ja: 控室で みんなと会って食べて休んで―

translation.en: we learn our lines and... we talk about how to make our show the best it can possibly be.
translation.ja: どうしたら いい舞台になるか話し合うの

translation.en: -And there's one in every theater. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: どの劇場にもある部屋だ

translation.en: Down there are the dressing rooms,
translation.ja: 楽屋では衣装を着てメイクする

translation.en: -where we put on our costumes and makeup. -[Julie] Now...
translation.ja: 楽屋では衣装を着てメイクする じゃ行きましょいざ ステージへ！

translation.en: follow me, everybody. To the stage!
translation.ja: じゃ行きましょいざ ステージへ！

translation.en: [all] To the stage!
translation.ja: いざ ステージへ！

translation.en: -Oh. Cool chair, Hank. -Oh, thanks!
translation.ja: いいイスだね ありがとう

translation.en: Do you have to stay in it all the time?
translation.ja: いつも座ってるの？

translation.en: Yep. I was born this way. But I'm used to it. And I can do a bunch of cool stuff. Check this out.
translation.ja: 生まれつきなんだいろんなことができるよ

translation.en: And here is the theater.
translation.ja: ここが劇場よ

translation.en: Isn't it beautiful?
translation.ja: ステキでしょ

translation.en: -[all] Oh, yeah. -[Gus] It is.
translation.ja: 確かに

translation.en: So, this is the stage where we'll be putting on our show, The Wizard of Oz.
translation.ja: ここで「オズの魔法使い」のお芝居をやるのよ

translation.en: [gasps] Wow! The Wizard of Oz! My favorite!
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法使い」って大好き！

translation.en: Now, the side areas, stage left and stage right,
translation.ja: 舞台の左側と右側は―

translation.en: those are called the wings.
translation.ja: “袖(そで)”って言うの

translation.en: Do they fly?
translation.ja: 着られるの？

translation.en: -Not exactly, Fizz. -[Fizz] Aw. But up there is called the flies.
translation.ja: 服じゃないの上にあるのはフライよ

translation.en: -[Spike] Wow. -Because most of our scenery is up there and it flies in and out.
translation.ja: ほとんどの舞台装置は上にあるの

translation.en: Is our Yellow Brick Road flying up there?
translation.ja: 黄色いレンガ道も上に？

translation.en: It will be, but now it's down in the basement, where we store the props and costumes and the rest of the scenery.
translation.ja: 今は他の小道具と一緒に地下室に置いてある

translation.en: Oh, Miss Julie, please can I play Dorothy?
translation.ja: 私がドロシーを演じてもいい？

translation.en: I just gotta wear those ruby slippers!
translation.ja: 赤い靴(くつ)を履(は)きたいの

translation.en: Ooh, and I wanna be the Lion.
translation.ja: 僕はライオンになりたい

translation.en: Hank, he's supposed to be cowardly.
translation.ja: ライオンは臆病(おくびょう)なのよ

translation.en: -Oh, right. [meows] -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Does everyone have to play a part? I don't mind just watching.
translation.ja: 演じなきゃダメ？私は見てるだけでいい

translation.en: Well, everybody contributes something, Riley.
translation.ja: 全員が何かをするのよ

translation.en: For instance, I contribute backstage, making all the tech stuff go smoothly.
translation.ja: 僕は裏方として技術的なことを受け持つ

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, I like tech stuff.
translation.ja: 技術的なことって好き

translation.en: There's plenty of tech in the theater, so maybe you can give me a hand.
translation.ja: じゃ手伝ってくれ

translation.en: -Copy that! -[Julie] Oh, oh.
translation.ja: 了解！

translation.en: Gus, darling, will you strike the ghost light?
translation.ja: ゴースト･ライトを片づけて

translation.en: -I don't like ghosts! -Don't panic.
translation.ja: ゴースト？ あわてないで　舞台用語で特別な照明のことよ

translation.en: It is just a theater term for a very special light.
translation.ja: あわてないで　舞台用語で特別な照明のことよ

translation.en: We put the ghost light out at the end of the day to make sure there's a little bit of light on stage for safety.
translation.ja: 劇場を使ってない時安全のためつけておくんだ

translation.en: -[all sigh] -[Riley] Oh. Safety first.
translation.ja: 安全か

translation.en: Now, come on. Come with me.
translation.ja: 一緒に来て

translation.en: Out here, where the audience sits, is called the house.
translation.ja: お客様が座る席は客席って言うの

translation.en: Wow. It has a lot more chairs than at my house.
translation.ja: うちよりずっとイスが多いわ

translation.en: Did you know Miss Julie's dad built this theater a long, long time ago?
translation.ja: ジュリー先生のお父さんが建てた劇場なんだ

translation.en: -[all] Wow. -[Julie] He did. He loved this place.
translation.ja: 父は ここが大好きだった

translation.en: Look at all the cool lights.
translation.ja: カッコいい照明ね

translation.en: And they all turn different colors, too.
translation.ja: 色を変えられる　見せても？

translation.en: -Can I show them? -Yes, go on.
translation.ja: 色を変えられる　見せても？ お願い

translation.en: [Peri] We'd love to see them.
translation.ja: 見たいわ

translation.en: Now, theater lighting can make the stage look like, um, sunset.
translation.ja: いいですよ 照明で夕方のように見せることができるの

translation.en: -[Julie chuckles] Or... or... -[Fizz] Wow!
translation.ja: ステキでしょ

translation.en: I know. Or it can make it look like a wonderful starry night.
translation.ja: または星空みたいに見せたり

translation.en: -[all gasp] -[Spike] Oh, look at the stars.
translation.ja: 星だ！

translation.en: It looks like my bed time.
translation.ja: もう寝(ね)る時間みたい

translation.en: Yes. Or it could look like a big storm is coming.
translation.ja: 大嵐が来るようにも見せられる

translation.en: -Like the tornado in The Wizard of Oz. -Absolutely.
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法使い」みたいに そのとおり

translation.en: -That is awesome! -[Julie laughing]
translation.ja: 超カッコいい！

translation.en: Okay, everybody, let me tell you a little bit about how our time together here will work.
translation.ja: このワークショップの内容を教えるわね

translation.en: We're not just putting on a show.
translation.ja: ショーをやるだけじゃなくて―

translation.en: We're also going to be learning about the magic of the performing arts.
translation.ja: パフォーミング･アーツの魅力(みりょく)について学ぶの

translation.en: I mean, dancing and singing and acting.
translation.ja: パフォーミング･アーツの魅力(みりょく)について学ぶの 踊りに歌に演技

translation.en: Miss Julie, what's the magic part?
translation.ja: どういう点が魅力なの？

translation.en: -Shall we tell them, Gus? -[Gus] Absolutely.
translation.ja: 教えてあげて はい

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.ja: 劇場では何でも叶(かな)う

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen on the stage ♪
translation.ja: ステージでは何でも可能

translation.en: ♪ What a sweet, amazing gift Making people's spirits lift ♪
translation.ja: ステキな贈(おく)り物　　観客の心が躍(おど)る

translation.en: ♪ As you bring to life The words on every page ♪
translation.ja: 脚本(きゃくほん)の言葉に　　生命を吹き込めば

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.ja: 劇場では何でも叶う

translation.en: ♪ Looking for adventure You will find it ♪
translation.ja: 冒険も見つかる

translation.en: ♪ If you're captured by the magic Of the curtain rising up ♪
translation.ja: ステージの魔法に　　　　魅せられたら

translation.en: ♪ Just imagine all the magic That's behind it ♪
translation.ja: どんな魔術が　　使われたか想像して

translation.en: ♪ Costumes needing sewing ♪
translation.ja: 手縫(ぬ)いの衣装の数々

translation.en: ♪ Lights to set a-glowing ♪
translation.ja: 光り輝(かがや)く照明

translation.en: ♪ Stretches, scales ♪ ♪ And warm-ups to be led ♪
translation.ja: ストレッチに発声練習　　　　　ウォームアップ

translation.en: ♪ One, two, three ♪ ♪ Have a line change or 11 ♪
translation.ja: ワンツースリー　　セリフの修正 11回も

translation.en: ♪ All the chaos ♪
translation.ja: 混乱の渦(うず)

translation.en: ♪ Ah, simply heaven ♪
translation.ja: 天国かも

translation.en: ♪ Here comes new song number seven ♪
translation.ja: 曲も増える　７曲目だ

translation.en: ♪ Cue the trumpet here instead ♪
translation.ja: ここでトランペットを

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.ja: 劇場では何でも叶う

translation.en: ♪ Why wait another moment? Take a seat ♪
translation.ja: 遠慮(えんりょ)しないで 座席に着いて

translation.en: ♪ For here's the secret something Every theater artist knows ♪
translation.ja: アーティストたちは　　　　　　知ってるの

translation.en: ♪ It's the audience That makes the show complete ♪
translation.ja: 観客がいて　　ショーは完成すると

translation.en: ♪ Plus the jokes that make us laugh ♪
translation.ja: それに面白い冗談

translation.en: ♪ And the dancers taking wing And the nice box office staff ♪
translation.ja: ダンサーに　　チケット売りの人たち

translation.en: ♪ Plus the high notes people sing ♪
translation.ja: 高音の歌声も

translation.en: Whoa, nice.
translation.ja: ステキだわ

translation.en: ♪ Though with surprise you may react It's a sweet and simple fact ♪
translation.ja: 驚(おどろ)くかもしれないけど　　　　　　　単純な事実

translation.en: [both] ♪ That anything can happen ♪ [all] ♪ In the theater ♪
translation.ja: 劇場では何でも叶う

translation.en: What was that?
translation.ja: 今のは何？

translation.en: I don't know. But it sounded like it came from the basement. I'm on it.
translation.ja: 地下室から聞こえた見てきます

translation.en: Well, um, tell you what, why don't we get started with our warm-up, huh?
translation.ja: じゃ まずはウォームアップから始めましょ

translation.en: Warm up? But it's not cold in here.
translation.ja: 寒くないのにウォームアップ？

translation.en: [chuckles] No, but all workshops begin with a warm-up,
translation.ja: ワークショップはウォームアップから始まるの

translation.en: and that's to wake up our voices and our bodies, so we're ready to perform. [all] Ah!
translation.ja: 声と体の準備を整えるためよ

translation.en: Yes, so now, do as I do. Okay?
translation.ja: 私と同じようにやってみて

translation.en: Now, warm-up stage left and warm-up stage right.
translation.ja: 左側にウォームアップ右側にウォームアップ

translation.en: [all] Warm-up stage left and warm-up stage right.
translation.ja: 左側にウォームアップ右側にウォームアップ

translation.en: Right, now, warm up your muscles to make them less tight.
translation.ja: 筋肉をウォームアップして柔らかくするの

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -Good.
translation.ja: そうそう

translation.en: Reach up to the rafters
translation.ja: 垂木(たるき)のほうへ伸びて

translation.en: and down to the stage.
translation.ja: ステージのほうへ かがむ

translation.en: [all] Reach up to the rafters
translation.ja: 垂木のほうへ伸びて

translation.en: and down to the stage.
translation.ja: ステージのほうへ かがむ

translation.en: Good. Warm up your shoulders and now your rib cage.
translation.ja: 肩を回して胸郭(きょうかく)もウォームアップ

translation.en: Good.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: -[clattering] -But what's that noise?
translation.ja: 何の音？

translation.en: I have no idea, but just keep going.
translation.ja: 分からないわいいから続けて

translation.en: -[Spike] Okay. -[Julie] Warm up your lips.
translation.ja: 唇(くちびる)をブルブル

translation.en: Good. Warm up your heart and warm up your voice.
translation.ja: ハートと声をウォームアップして

translation.en: And we're ready to start.
translation.ja: これで始められるわ

translation.en: -Hey, Jools. -Hmm?
translation.ja: ジュリー先生

translation.en: [yelps] What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してるの？

translation.en: [whispers] We got a little situation in the basement.
translation.ja: マズいことに

translation.en: -What kind of situation? -[all] What?
translation.ja: マズい？

translation.en: [whispers] A burst pipe.
translation.ja: パイプの破裂(はれつ)です

translation.en: -A what? -A burst pipe.
translation.ja: 何？ パイプが破裂した

translation.en: A burst pipe? How bad?
translation.ja: 破裂した？　被害(ひがい)は？

translation.en: Oh, my.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: Ahh! My ruby slippers!
translation.ja: 私の赤い靴が！

translation.en: Is it raining in the basement?
translation.ja: 雨が降ってるの？

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.ja: そんなとこさ

translation.en: I tried to fix it. It's pretty bad. We gotta call the plumber.
translation.ja: 配管工を呼ばなきゃ全部 水浸(みずびた)しです

translation.en: -Everything is underwater. -Everything?
translation.ja: 配管工を呼ばなきゃ全部 水浸(みずびた)しです 全部？

translation.en: Props? Costumes? Scripts?
translation.ja: 小道具も？　衣装も？脚本も？

translation.en: Even the Yellow Brick Road?
translation.ja: 黄色いレンガ道も？

translation.en: -Not so yellow anymore. -[Hank gasps]
translation.ja: もう黄色くない

translation.en: -[all] Oh! -[Riley] That's unfortunate.
translation.ja: それってヤバい

translation.en: Call the plumber.
translation.ja: 配管工を

translation.en: Oh. This is terrible. It's taken years to build up our stock.
translation.ja: 困ったわ　何年もかけてそろえてきたのに

translation.en: Everything we need for The Wizard of Oz is ruined.
translation.ja: 芝居に必要な物全部がダメに

translation.en: [gasps] No Wizard of Oz?
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法使い」はなし？

translation.en: I'm afraid not, Peri.
translation.ja: 残念だけどね

translation.en: -[Peri] Oh, no. -[Riley] Oh, that's a shame.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: Well, that was the plumbing company. They're gonna try to get someone here as soon as possible.
translation.ja: できるだけ早く配管工をよこすそうです

translation.en: [gasps] And Edna Brightful was coming to see the show.
translation.ja: エドナが来るはずだったのに

translation.en: Yikes, I forgot about that.
translation.ja: 忘れてました

translation.en: Who's Edna Brightful?
translation.ja: エドナって？

translation.en: She's a great patron of the arts, Hank.
translation.ja: 彼女はパトロンよ

translation.en: She gives money to theater programs like ours to... help us do our work.
translation.ja: 作品を上演できるようお金を出してくれるの

translation.en: [chuckles] Now we'll have nothing to show her.
translation.ja: でも もう見せる物がない

translation.en: Let me see what I can salvage.
translation.ja: 何かあるかも

translation.en: What's gonna happen?
translation.ja: どうなるの？

translation.en: I don't know, but I've got a sump pump at my house, if that helps.
translation.ja: うちにある排水ポンプを使ったらいいかも

translation.en: A thump thump?
translation.ja: 排水ポンプ？

translation.en: Well, guess I won't be playing the Cowardly Lion.
translation.ja: ライオンを演じられないのか

translation.en: [sighs] And no Tin Man for me.
translation.ja: ブリキ男もね

translation.en: It's okay. Riley has a thump thump.
translation.ja: 大丈夫ライリーのポンプがあるわ

translation.en: It seems everything's falling apart today.
translation.ja: 今日は何もかもうまくいかないわね

translation.en: -Miss Julie? -Yes, Spike.
translation.ja: ジュリー先生 何？

translation.en: [stutters] I made up a rhyme for you.
translation.ja: 詩を作りました

translation.en: Uh, when everything you care about goes down the drain,
translation.ja: “すべてを棒に振(ふ)っても―”

translation.en: just remember, 'round the corner is a candy cane.
translation.ja: “キャンディー棒はまた見つかる”

translation.en: That's lovely, Spike. [inhales deeply]
translation.ja: ステキな詩ね

translation.en: -Yeah, it makes me feel much better. -Oh, good.
translation.ja: 元気が出たわ よかった

translation.en: -Miss Julie, are we getting candy canes? -[Julie chuckles]
translation.ja: キャンディー棒がもらえるの？

translation.en: -Not quite, Fizz, no. -[Fizz] Oh.
translation.ja: そうじゃないのよ

translation.en: Spike is just reminding me that things can always get better.
translation.ja: 物事は またよくなると励(はげ)ましてくれたの

translation.en: You know we have a saying in the theater? "The show must go on."
translation.ja: “ショーは続けなければいけない”のよ

translation.en: So maybe we'll just have to do a different show,
translation.ja: ちがうショーをやればいいかも

translation.en: one that doesn't need a lot of scenery or costumes.
translation.ja: おおがかりな舞台装置がいらないショーを

translation.en: -A different show? -Well, what'll it be about?
translation.ja: ちがうショー？ どんなショー？

translation.en: Well, I'm not sure yet.
translation.ja: 分からないけど…

translation.en: But you know, I've always wanted to do an original musical.
translation.ja: ずっとオリジナルのミュージカルがやりたかった

translation.en: Huh. Maybe this is the moment.
translation.ja: 今が その時かも

translation.en: Okay, so I managed to find a few things that weren't ruined. -Um, a flower basket. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 無事だった物を見つけました花カゴに…

translation.en: A trombone, uh, a frying pan, a shield...
translation.ja: トロンボーンにフライパン 盾(たて)に この王冠(おうかん)

translation.en: Um, this crown. And this.
translation.ja: 盾(たて)に この王冠(おうかん) それに これ！

translation.en: Good heavens! [laughs] That's not one of our props.
translation.ja: この子は小道具じゃないわ

translation.en: He says he came out of the burst pipe, and his name is Hugo.
translation.ja: 破裂したパイプから出てきたヒューゴです

translation.en: I studied Duck at Wesleyan.
translation.ja: アヒル語が分かるんです

translation.en: Well, um... [clears throat] how do you do?
translation.ja: それじゃ… こんにちは

translation.en: What's he saying now?
translation.ja: 何て言ったの？

translation.en: Well, he says he'd like to be part of the show.
translation.ja: ショーに出たいって

translation.en: [Peri] A duck in our show? I'm confused. Can ducks act?
translation.ja: アヒルがショーに？演技できないでしょ

translation.en: -[scoffs] -I mean, he's a duck. What would he do?
translation.ja: できっこないわ

translation.en: -[all clamoring] -[stutters] No, no, no. Wait. Wait.
translation.ja: ちょっと待って

translation.en: The theater never discriminates, so we'll have to consider this.
translation.ja: 芝居の世界に差別はないの検討するわ

translation.en: Well, he says he'd like to audition.
translation.ja: オーディションを受けたいと

translation.en: Does anyone know Ponchielli's La Danza Delle Ore?
translation.ja: “時の踊り”が弾ける人は？

translation.en: Not by heart.
translation.ja: 楽譜(がくふ)があれば

translation.en: He also says he can be helpful backstage. Props...
translation.ja: 裏方も手伝うと言ってます

translation.en: -Sound effects. -[quacks]
translation.ja: 音響(おんきょう)効果とか

translation.en: -Swabbing the deck. -[quacks]
translation.ja: ステージの掃除とか

translation.en: -And he's a natural for the aerial ballet. -[quacks]
translation.ja: 空中バレエも お手のもの

translation.en: I guess that settles it, then. He's in.
translation.ja: 言うことないわ　合格よ

translation.en: -[Spike] Yeah! -Bravo!
translation.ja: こんなアヒル見たことないわ

translation.en: -I've never seen a duck do that better! -[Julie] Oh!
translation.ja: こんなアヒル見たことないわ イディナ！　ようこそ

translation.en: -Idina! Hello! -[chuckling]
translation.ja: イディナ！　ようこそ

translation.en: -Thank you for having me here. -Welcome. I'm so pleased you're here.
translation.ja: お招きありがとう 来てくれてうれしい

translation.en: -Remember Gus? -There she is. -Welcome back, superstar! -Hi!
translation.ja: お帰り　スーパースター！

translation.en: -[laughs] I still remember. -So nice to see you.
translation.ja: うれしいよ まだ覚えてた

translation.en: Greenies, please say hello to our guest today...
translation.ja: ゲストに ごあいさつして

translation.en: Idina... Idina Menzel?
translation.ja: イ… イディナ･メンゼル？

translation.en: -[laughs] Yes, it's so nice to meet you. -[sighs]
translation.ja: そうよお会いできてうれしいわ

translation.en: Each time we meet,
translation.ja: 毎回 ゲストが―

translation.en: a special guest will lead us in a master class in one of the performing arts.
translation.ja: パフォーミング･アーツについて教えてくれるの

translation.en: And today, Idina will be introducing us to theater arts.
translation.ja: 今日はイディナが演劇について教えてくれるわ

translation.en: -I love theater arts, Idina Menzel. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 私は演劇が大好きなの

translation.en: Idina started out as one of our Greenies here, just like you all and Gus.
translation.ja: イディナも このワークショップ出身なのよ

translation.en: Yeah, when I studied the theater arts with Miss Julie, it was a life-changing experience for me.
translation.ja: ジュリー先生の下で勉強して人生が変わったわ

translation.en: I love performing, Idina Menzel.
translation.ja: 私は演技が大好きなの

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: -This is Peri. -Ah.
translation.ja: ペリよ

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm Peri. Please say my name. -Hi, Peri.
translation.ja: “ペリ”と言って ペリ

translation.en: -Oh, you said my name! -[laughs]
translation.ja: 言ってくれた！

translation.en: -And this is Spike and Riley and Fizz... -[Fizz] Hi.
translation.ja: スパイクにライリーにフィズにハンク

translation.en: -...and Hank and Hugo. -[Hank] Hi.
translation.ja: スパイクにライリーにフィズにハンク それにヒューゴよ

translation.en: Jools, the plumber is here and would like a word with you.
translation.ja: 配管工がお話ししたいそうです

translation.en: -[sighs] Thank goodness. -Plumber? Oh, burst pipe.
translation.ja: パイプが破裂したの

translation.en: Gus, can you take over here?
translation.ja: ここは任せるわ

translation.en: -Will do. -Oh, good.
translation.ja: いいですよ

translation.en: -Oh, uh, you're gonna need these. -What?
translation.ja: これを 何？

translation.en: -Here. -Oh, okay.
translation.ja: 分かったわ

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Thank you, love. I'll see you in a minute, then.
translation.ja: ありがとう　すぐ戻るわ

translation.en: -[Hank] Okay, bye. -[all] Bye, Miss Julie.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: Okay, Greenies. Uh, Peri may know our guest.
translation.ja: 今日のゲストを知ってる？

translation.en: I do. [chuckles]
translation.ja: もちろんよ

translation.en: But the rest of you may not,
translation.ja: 知らない子のために―

translation.en: so I'm gonna show you guys a little glimpse of what Idina's been up to since she left the Greenroom.
translation.ja: イディナのこれまでをお見せするよ

translation.en: I hope you're not gonna show that moment when I tripped over my broomstick.
translation.ja: ホウキにつまずいたのは見せないで

translation.en: -[Peri] I wanna see it. -[cackles]
translation.ja: 見たい

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, did you hear that cackle? I have a witch's cackle.
translation.ja: 今のは魔女の笑い声ね

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[cackling] Ah, I can't stop.
translation.ja: 止まらない

translation.en: -All right, guys. Check this out. -Okay.
translation.ja: じゃ これを見て

translation.en: [Julie] As a little girl, Idina Menzel loved to sing so much,
translation.ja: “イディナ･メンゼル”歌うことが大好きだったイディナは

translation.en: that she started singing lessons when she was only eight years old.
translation.ja: わずか８歳(さい)で歌のレッスンを始めます

translation.en: Now she's a famous singer and actress.
translation.ja: 今や有名な歌手であり女優

translation.en: She's the voice of Elsa in the movie Frozen.
translation.ja: 「アナと雪の女王」のエルサや

translation.en: She's also starred in lots of Broadway shows,
translation.ja: 数々のブロードウェー作品に出演

translation.en: including the role of Elphaba, the Wicked Witch of the West,
translation.ja: ミュージカル「ウィキッド」では―

translation.en: in the musical, Wicked.
translation.ja: エルファバ役を熱演

translation.en: Recently, Idina helped start a theater camp called A BroaderWay,
translation.ja: 最近 彼女が設立した“ブローダーウェー”は

translation.en: that gives young girls opportunities to learn from Broadway actors.
translation.ja: 若い女の子が現役の俳優から演技を学べる場です

translation.en: Aren't we lucky that Idina is here today to share her love of musical theater?
translation.ja: 今日 イディナに教わるのはミュージカルの魅力です

translation.en: [Peri exclaims] Oh, Idina!
translation.ja: ああ イディナ！

translation.en: I can't believe you started here, just like us.
translation.ja: あなたも ここの出身なんて信じられない

translation.en: [chuckles] I did, and I did so many shows with Miss Julie. What are you guys thinking of doing?
translation.ja: たくさんのショーに出たわあなたたちは何を？

translation.en: Well, we were gonna do The Wizard of Oz...
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法使い」をやるはずだった

translation.en: -But our Yellow Brick Road turned beige. -[all] Yeah.
translation.ja: でも黄色のレンガ道がベージュに

translation.en: -Oh, no. That's awful. -[Peri] I know.
translation.ja: 困ったわね 私はドロシーを演じるはずだった

translation.en: I was going to play Dorothy.
translation.ja: 私はドロシーを演じるはずだった

translation.en: Actually, Peri, the Witch is by far the better part.
translation.ja: 魔女のほうがずっといい役よ

translation.en: So, any other ideas?
translation.ja: 他の案は？

translation.en: -Oh, we don't have a clue. -[both sigh]
translation.ja: 何もないの

translation.en: [gasps] I know. Something with music.
translation.ja: 音楽のショーは？

translation.en: [sing-song] Some, uh, rock 'n roll?
translation.ja: ロックンロール？

translation.en: Or how about a ballet? -I'd love to wear a tutu. -[Idina chuckles]
translation.ja: バレエは？チュチュを着たいわ

translation.en: -How about a candy cane parade? -[quacks inquisitively]
translation.ja: キャンディー棒のパレードとか

translation.en: Those are all excellent ideas. And I do love candy canes, Fizz. -[Fizz] Oh... -Anyone else?
translation.ja: いいアイデアね私もキャンディーは大好きよ

translation.en: Don't look at me. I signed up for robotics.
translation.ja: 私に聞かないで何も分からない

translation.en: He's suggesting The Little Mermaid. I feel like we should stay away from anything with water.
translation.ja: 「リトル･マーメイド」？水は避(さ)けたいな

translation.en: But I do love musicals.
translation.ja: ミュージカルって大好き

translation.en: So do I.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: Miss Julie said she wanted to do an orangi ball musical.
translation.ja: オレンジボール･ミュージカルね

translation.en: Oh, she means original musical.
translation.ja: オリジナル･ミュージカルだろ

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: オリジナル･ミュージカルだろ ジュリー先生がずっとやりたがってた

translation.en: Miss Julie always wanted to do an original musical for years.
translation.ja: ジュリー先生がずっとやりたがってた

translation.en: But how do we do that?
translation.ja: どうやって？

translation.en: Yeah, I've never even seen a musical before.
translation.ja: ミュージカルって見たことない

translation.en: Maybe what you should do is go see a great musical in action.
translation.ja: 本物のミュージカルを見に行けば―

translation.en: That will help give you some ideas for yours.
translation.ja: 名案が浮かぶかもよ

translation.en: -[Gus] Yes. Yeah. -[Hank] Yeah. But, but... well, how?
translation.ja: でもどうやって？

translation.en: -Field trip. -[all gasp]
translation.ja: 見学に行くの

translation.en: I'll make a few calls. I'll stay here and help Julie.
translation.ja: 私が手配するわ

translation.en: Fire up the bus, Gus. These kids are going to Broadway.
translation.ja: バスに乗ってブロードウェーへ

translation.en: [gasps] Really?
translation.ja: ホント？

translation.en: We're going to Broadway.
translation.ja: ブロードウェーだ！

translation.en: -That's so cool! Wow! -[all exclaiming]
translation.ja: すごい！

translation.en: Guys, let's go. Come on.
translation.ja: さあ 行こう！

translation.en: [Peri] I can't believe we're here.
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: -[gasps] You're Rachel Tucker. -I am.
translation.ja: レイチェル･タッカー！

translation.en: You're Rachel Tucker. You play Elphaba now in Wicked on Broadway.
translation.ja: 「ウィキッド」でエルファバを演じた人ね

translation.en: -I do. [chuckles] -[all gasp and chuckle]
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: It is so brilliant to meet you guys. Welcome to the Gershwin Theatre.
translation.ja: ガーシュウィン劇場へようこそ

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Rachel Tucker.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Idina called, so I've been expecting you lot.
translation.ja: イディナから聞いてるわ

translation.en: And I believe you would love a backstage tour.
translation.ja: 舞台裏を見たくない？

translation.en: -[Peri] Yes, we would! -[all exclaim]
translation.ja: もちろん！

translation.en: -Let's do it. -[all cheering]
translation.ja: 行きましょ

translation.en: So, Riley, this is the Wizard's head.
translation.ja: これが魔法使いの頭よ

translation.en: -Amazing. -Right?
translation.ja: どうやって動かすの？

translation.en: -How does it work? -Well, we have crew guys behind it.
translation.ja: どうやって動かすの？ 後ろにスタッフがいるの

translation.en: The jaw moves and even the eyes light up.
translation.ja: アゴが動いて 目が光るのよ

translation.en: -Are you kidding? -It's incredible.
translation.ja: ウソ！ すごいでしょ

translation.en: -That's amazing. -[chuckles] Right?
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: -[chuckles] Hey, Hugo. Don't worry. -[quacks]
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　ヒューゴ

translation.en: It's just a mask. The mask that we use in the show.
translation.ja: ショーで使うマスクなの

translation.en: So this is the orchestra pit.
translation.ja: オーケストラ席よ

translation.en: Wow! The orchestra plays down there?
translation.ja: ここで演奏を？

translation.en: Uh-huh. All 24 musicians.
translation.ja: 24人の団員がね

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh! -Right? -That's incredible. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: ホント？　すごいな

translation.en: Oh, someday I wanna play down there.
translation.ja: いつか ここで演奏したい

translation.en: Wow! Is this your dressing room?
translation.ja: ここが楽屋？

translation.en: Yes, this is where I get ready every evening for the show.
translation.ja: 毎晩 ここで準備するの

translation.en: [gasps] Is this where you get green?
translation.ja: ここで緑色になるの？

translation.en: -It is! Yes. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: Look, I have a photograph of how I look when I'm completely greenified.
translation.ja: 完全に緑色になった時の写真がこれ

translation.en: [Fizz] Wow. Spooky.
translation.ja: 気味悪い

translation.en: -[both giggling] -[Rachel] It is a bit.
translation.ja: そうよね

translation.en: Can you show me how you get green?
translation.ja: どうやって緑色に？

translation.en: Oh, yes, I can. Look, just look this way.
translation.ja: 教えるわ　見てて

translation.en: -It's green paint that gets put on. -Oh... [gasps]
translation.ja: 緑色のペイントを塗(ぬ)るの

translation.en: It's very nice and smooth. It's a bit cold.
translation.ja: なめらかなのよ少し冷たいの

translation.en: -[Fizz] Wow! -Do you like that?
translation.ja: どう？

translation.en: Yeah, I like that.
translation.ja: ステキ！

translation.en: How about I do some on you?
translation.ja: 塗っていい？

translation.en: [gasps] Yes, please. Yes, please.
translation.ja: お願い！

translation.en: -Yeah? Okay, give me your hand. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 手を出して

translation.en: -Oh, my goodness. [whoops] -[laughs]
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.ja: 最高だわ

translation.en: -Look at all of the Emerald City... -Beautiful, right?
translation.ja: エメラルド･シティの… キレイでしょ？

translation.en: -Oh, I love all of them so much. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 全部気に入ったわ

translation.en: What... what's this? Is this what I think it is?
translation.ja: これはもしかして…

translation.en: -It is. [chuckles] -They are? They're not...
translation.ja: そうよ 本当に？

translation.en: This is my Wicked Witch dress that I wear in the second half.
translation.ja: 後半で着る魔女の衣装よ

translation.en: Oh. And that's Glinda's dress?
translation.ja: これはグリンダの？

translation.en: -And that's Glinda's dress. -Oh!
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Oh, I love this so much.
translation.ja: すごすぎるわ

translation.en: [Hank] Hey.
translation.ja: あれ？

translation.en: [Peri exclaims] Look at that.
translation.ja: あれを見て！

translation.en: -♪ Dancing through life ♪ -Hey, guys.
translation.ja: ガスよ やあ

translation.en: -[all chattering excitedly] -Oh, they're back.
translation.ja: 帰ってきたわ

translation.en: [Hank] That was so cool.
translation.ja: 最高だったよ

translation.en: Welcome back, Greenies.
translation.ja: お帰りなさい！

translation.en: So, how was the show?
translation.ja: ショーはどうだった？

translation.en: -It was awesome! -[overlapping chatter]
translation.ja: すばらしかったわ

translation.en: Really? Oh, thank you, Idina. You know, the gift you've just given us, amazing.
translation.ja: ありがとう イディナすばらしい贈り物だわ

translation.en: Aw, it's my pleasure.
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: How did it go with the plumber?
translation.ja: 配管工は？

translation.en: Oh, well, he... he did what he could for today. But come on, I want to hear all about it. Tell me.
translation.ja: できることはやってくれたわそれより話を聞かせて

translation.en: Oh, it was such a cool story.
translation.ja: 物語がカッコいい

translation.en: And the music was awesome.
translation.ja: 音楽もすごいんだ

translation.en: And the singing and dancing were so... [sing-song] fabulous.
translation.ja: 歌や踊りもサイコー！

translation.en: And there was all this amazing technical stuff, like... like lighting and hydraulics.
translation.ja: 照明とか水力学とか技術的なこともすごい

translation.en: And lots and lots of actors,
translation.ja: 俳優もワンサカ！

translation.en: who dressed up and who bowed at the end, like this.
translation.ja: 衣装を着て 最後にこんな風におじぎするの

translation.en: -Well, there. -[Hugo snoring]
translation.ja: そうだったの

translation.en: Sounds like you had a very big day, right?
translation.ja: 盛りだくさんの１日だったみたいね

translation.en: But what should our show be like?
translation.ja: 僕らのショーは？

translation.en: It won't be like a Broadway show.
translation.ja: ブロードウェーみたいにはならない

translation.en: 'Cause it wouldn't have hydraulics.
translation.ja: 水力学も使えないし

translation.en: Yeah. We don't have all those fancy costumes.
translation.ja: ぜいたくな衣装もないわ

translation.en: Yeah. This is gonna be hard.
translation.ja: ああ　難しいね

translation.en: You don't need all of that stuff.
translation.ja: 工夫するのよ

translation.en: No. If we put our minds together and, uh... What do you think?
translation.ja: 一緒に力を合わせれば…どう思う？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.ja: 何とかなります

translation.en: Let me tell you a little secret.
translation.ja: 秘けつを教えるわ

translation.en: -[Peri] What is it, Idina Menzel? -[Hank] Yeah?
translation.ja: 秘けつって？

translation.en: ♪ When you're confused Feeling down on your own ♪
translation.ja: うまくいかなくて　　　　　悩んだ時は

translation.en: ♪ When your fire won't light the way ♪
translation.ja: どうすればいいか　　　分からない時は

translation.en: ♪ That's when you have to go In search of the unknown ♪
translation.ja: 今までとはちがう道を探す

translation.en: ♪ The promise of a brand new day ♪
translation.ja: 新たな希望を

translation.en: ♪ If you don't see it Then change your view ♪
translation.ja: 希望が見えなければ　　　　　見方を変えて

translation.en: ♪ If you don't wish it It can't come true ♪
translation.ja: 願わなければ実現しない

translation.en: ♪ You must open your heart ♪ ♪ Let go of your doubt ♪
translation.ja: 心を開いて　　疑いを捨てて

translation.en: ♪ It won't rain forever The sun will come out ♪
translation.ja: 雨はいつかやみ　　太陽が顔を出す

translation.en: ♪ You don't need to know the answers now ♪
translation.ja: すぐに答えが　　出なくてもいい

translation.en: -♪ Just believe in yourself ♪ -[Peri] Oh, wow.
translation.ja: 自分を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And I know that you'll Get there somehow ♪
translation.ja: そうすれば　　いつか願いがかなう

translation.en: ♪ Yes, believe in yourself ♪
translation.ja: そう 自分を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And I know that You'll get there somehow ♪
translation.ja: そうすれば　　いつか願いがかなう

translation.en: [Peri] Oh, Idina.
translation.ja: イディナ

translation.en: [Hank] Thank you. That really...
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -[Julie] Oh, Idina.
translation.ja: イディナ

translation.en: I couldn't have put it better.
translation.ja: すばらしかったわ

translation.en: You see, Greenies, we will get there somehow.
translation.ja: 何とかショーを作れるわよ

translation.en: Let's change our view.
translation.ja: 見方を変えましょ

translation.en: [gasps] I see a crown!
translation.ja: 王冠があるわ

translation.en: [gasps] Hey!
translation.ja: おっと！

translation.en: [gasps] Hey, a trombone.
translation.ja: トロンボーンだ

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, Hugo.
translation.ja: ごめん　ヒューゴ

translation.en: -What did he say? -Don't ask.
translation.ja: 何て？ 言えない

translation.en: Couldn't we use all these things in our new show?
translation.ja: これらを全部使えば？

translation.en: Yeah. And maybe Gus and I could make some new things to go with them.
translation.ja: ガスと私で新しい物を作れるかも

translation.en: That reminds me...
translation.ja: そう言えば…

translation.en: I've got something for you, Riley. [sighs] -[Riley] Oh? -Your very own tool belt.
translation.ja: 君にあげるよツールベルトだ

translation.en: My own precision calipers. Thank you.
translation.ja: ノギスだわ　ありがとう

translation.en: [stammering] Wait. A trombone, a crown. Those things don't go together.
translation.ja: トロンボーンに王冠？合わないわよ

translation.en: They're from different shows.
translation.ja: ちがうショーの物でしょ

translation.en: Hmm. [gasps] Wait. -What? [gasps] -Lightbulb! Why don't we put all the things together in one show?
translation.ja: ひらめいた！同じショーで全部使うのは？

translation.en: You mean a bunch of different things mashed-up together?
translation.ja: 全部 ゴチャ混ぜに？

translation.en: Yeah. Mash-Up: The Musical.
translation.ja: 「ごちゃまぜミュージカル」だ

translation.en: I think you may be on to something.
translation.ja: 見えてきたわね

translation.en: I like it, Jools.
translation.ja: いい考えだわ

translation.en: Way to go, Greenies.
translation.ja: その調子だ

translation.en: -[all] Yeah! -[Hank] We did it.
translation.ja: やったね！

translation.en: You see that? You got there. You found your idea.
translation.ja: アイデアが見つかった

translation.en: [Julie] Thank you, dear Idina. Oh, my gosh, you've set us back on track. [exclaims]
translation.ja: あなたのおかげで何とかなりそうよ

translation.en: I'm so glad. I can't wait to see the final result.
translation.ja: どんなショーになるか楽しみだわ

translation.en: Mash-Up: The Musical.
translation.ja: 「ごちゃまぜミュージカル」

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[Spike] I like it.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: So... what's the story gonna be about?
translation.ja: それで… どんな物語に？

translation.en: Let's worry about that next time. It's time for you to get home.
translation.ja: それは次回考えよう帰る時間だよ

translation.en: But there's still so much to do.
translation.ja: まだやることが

translation.en: I think we're in great shape. I mean, we've got our idea,
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ アイデアは出たし　あとは…

translation.en: and all we need now is to, um...
translation.ja: アイデアは出たし　あとは…

translation.en: compose the music and... design the scenery,
translation.ja: 曲を作って舞台装置をデザインして―

translation.en: -build the props and... -[Idina] Mmm. ...come up with a little thing called a story.
translation.ja: 小道具を作って物語を考えるだけ

translation.en: -[Idina chuckles] -Ha! Piece of cake.
translation.ja: 小道具を作って物語を考えるだけ チョロいわ

translation.en: -[Peri] Piece of cake. -[Hank] Okay!
translation.ja: そうよ　チョロいわ

translation.en: -[Peri] See you, Miss Julie. -[Hank] Bye, Miss Julie. -[Fizz] Bye, Miss Julie. Bye, Idina. -Thank you again.
translation.ja: さよなら ジュリー先生

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 今日はありがとう

translation.en: Bye, my dears. Good-bye, everybody.
translation.ja: みんな さよなら

translation.en: Uh, Miss Julie, Miss Julie.
translation.ja: ジュリー先生

translation.en: -Uh, yes, Fizz? -Um... when I grow up...
translation.ja: 何かしら いつか あなたみたいに自分の劇場を持ちたいわ

translation.en: I want to have my own theater, just like you.
translation.ja: いつか あなたみたいに自分の劇場を持ちたいわ

translation.en: Oh, Fizz.
translation.ja: フィズったら
